snippet: WHITE--Erica (Stolz), age 89, passed away peacefully on Sunday, April 17, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Dorian and companion of the late Curtis. Loving mother of Ronald (Susan) White. Adored grandmother of Joshua (Matthew Mills) and Jacob White. Memorial service on Tuesday, April 19th at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th Street, at 11:30am. Remembrances may be made to DOROT, an organization which enriched her life immensely. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WHITE--Erica (Stolz), age 89, passed away peacefully on Sunday, April 17, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Dorian and companion of the late Curtis. Loving mother of Ronald (Susan) White. Adored grandmother of Joshua (Matthew Mills) and Jacob White. Memorial service on Tuesday, April 19th at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th Street, at 11:30am. Remembrances may be made to DOROT, an organization which enriched her life immensely. 1/3
